Package com.revature.revabank.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationException
    Thrown when a potential entity is not registered with the system, i.e., a user tries to login to a server they have not registered with.
    InvalidRequestException
    Thrown when improper requests are submitted, i.e., null values where non-null values are essential.
    NegativeTransactionException
    Thrown when a transaction was attempted with negative amounts, i.e., trying to deposit negative money.
    OverflowTransactionException
    Thrown when a transaction would lead to overflow or infinite values, i.e., wrapping from Integer.MAX_VALUE to Integer.MIN_VALUE because of an attempt to add 1 to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
    ResourceNotFoundException
    Thrown when an item from a repository cannot be located, i.e., an account was not located in a search.
    ResourcePersistenceException
    Thrown when a resource that has attempted to be saved cannot be.
    ScreenNotFoundException
    Thrown when a route to a screen is no longer servicable, i.e., /account/Henry no longer exists due to Henry being deleted.
    TransactionException
    Thrown when a transaction or multiple transactions have failed, i.e., due to lack of funds.
